1.text: Your face is familiar! Haven't I seen you here before?

2.text: Most people would rather die than think; in fact, they do so.

3.text: Maybe I should go stand in the corner and be ashamed?

4.text: I feel that we are all philosophers, and that those who describe themselves as a philosopher, simply do not have a day job to go to.

5.text: If failure has the strength to turn your life into bitterness itself, then patience has the strength to turn your life into the sweetest joy. Do not surrender to fate after a single failure. Failure, at most, precedes success.

6.text: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.

7.text: There is only one meaning of life: the act of living itself.

8.text: For me, a poem starts when a felicitious phrase springs to mind.

9.text: I'm so scared I wish I had a ham sandwich.

10.text: I can already taste those chocolate-covered hotdogs.
